issue.title: [Java][FlightSQL] Implement catalog functions as a pseudo table
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12927](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12927). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12927?focusedCommentId=17378172) by Kyle Porter (kylep):*
Due to the change in design, this is now redundant. Catalog functions are implemented as commands that leverage the normal Arrow Flight way of streaming results.
